Name: iShares 20 Plus Year Treasury Bond ETF
Rationale: Safety asset that should rally if risk assets collapse and liquidity flees to sovereigns.

Name: iShares 7 10 Year Treasury Bond ETF
Rationale: Intermediate Treasuries provide duration hedge and capital preservation in credit stress.

Name: Vanguard Total Bond Market ETF
Rationale: Broad bond exposure to stabilize returns and generate income when equities retract.

Name: iShares iBoxx Investment Grade Corporate Bond ETF
Rationale: High quality corporate credit should outperform lower rated debt during a private credit shock.

Name: iShares iBoxx High Yield Corporate Bond ETF
Rationale: High yield is vulnerable to credit deterioration and forced selling if private credit liquidity dries up.

Name: iShares J P Morgan USD Emerging Markets Bond ETF
Rationale: Emerging sovereigns are sensitive to global risk off and capital outflows during systemic stress.

Name: J P Morgan Ultra Short Income ETF
Rationale: Ultra short exposure provides a safe harbor and liquidity to deploy into opportunities after dislocations.

Name: iShares National Muni Bond ETF
Rationale: Municipal bonds offer tax efficient defensive income and relative stability compared to private credit.

Name: Vanguard Intermediate Term Corporate Bond ETF
Rationale: Intermediate quality corporates balance yield and credit resilience under stress.

Name: iShares 1 3 Year Treasury Bond ETF
Rationale: Short duration Treasuries protect capital while preserving optionality to redeploy after market capitulation.

Name: SPDR SSGA IG Public and Private Credit ETF
Rationale: Direct private credit exposure is illiquid and likely to suffer valuation resets if the private credit market tightens.

Name: Virtus Private Credit Strategy ETF
Rationale: Private credit strategies face funding strain and mark to market losses under a private credit bust scenario.

Name: BondBloxx Private Credit CLO ETF
Rationale: CLO and private credit tranches can experience sharp repricing and liquidity shortfalls during stress.

Name: Invesco Senior Loan ETF
Rationale: Senior loans are exposed to credit losses and reduced refinancing in a wider private credit contagion.

Name: SPDR Blackstone Senior Loan ETF
Rationale: Active senior loan managers may face underlying borrower distress and secondary illiquidity.

Name: SPDR Gold Shares
Rationale: Gold should act as a safe haven and store of value when confidence in risk assets collapses.

Name: iShares S P GSCI Commodity Indexed Trust
Rationale: Broad commodity exposure can benefit from de risking in financial assets and rotation into real assets.

Name: Vanguard Real Estate ETF
Rationale: High quality real estate can provide income and defend against equity drawdowns if leverage unwinds in other areas.

Name: SPDR Dow Jones International Real Estate ETF
Rationale: Geographic diversification in real estate reduces domestic concentrated credit risks.

Name: iShares Global Clean Energy ETF
Rationale: Regulated and contracted clean energy assets should see stable cash flows relative to speculative credit.

Name: iShares Mortgage Real Estate ETF
Rationale: Mortgage related equities have high rate and liquidity sensitivity and can collapse in a credit driven panic.

Name: iShares TIPS Bond ETF
Rationale: Inflation linked bonds protect purchasing power if monetary policies react to market shocks.

Name: iShares Global Infrastructure ETF
Rationale: Contracted cash flows from infrastructure assets provide resilience during systemic deleveraging.

Name: VanEck Agribusiness ETF
Rationale: Food and agribusiness assets retain fundamental demand even under financial stress.

Name: iShares Global Timber and Forestry ETF
Rationale: Timber assets are long duration real assets with low correlation to financial market cycles.

Name: ProShares VIX Short Term Futures ETF
Rationale: VIX exposure provides tactical crisis insurance during sharp equity sell offs.

Name: ProShares Short 20 Year Treasury ETF
Rationale: Hold a small inverse Treasury position only if anticipating policy driven rapid rate increases after market stress.

Name: iMGP DBi Managed Futures Strategy ETF
Rationale: Managed futures can capture trend moves and provide crisis alpha across rates commodities and currencies.

Name: SPDR Bloomberg Convertible Securities ETF
Rationale: Convertible bonds give limited downside with upside optionality if equities stabilize after the bust.

Name: RPAR Risk Parity ETF
Rationale: Risk parity diversifies across assets and reduces reliance on any single market for returns.

Name: Invesco QQQ Trust
Rationale: Concentrated exposure to high multiple tech could see sharp multiple contraction if AI hype collapses.

Name: VanEck Semiconductor ETF
Rationale: Semiconductor demand can fall quickly if AI capex is delayed leading to inventory adjustments and margin pressure.

Name: ROBO Global Robotics and Automation ETF
Rationale: Thematic automation plays are highly sentiment driven and vulnerable to a rotation out of speculative narratives.

Name: ETFMG Prime Cyber Security ETF
Rationale: Cybersecurity has defensive characteristics that should hold value when market confidence drops.

Name: Global X Robotics and Artificial Intelligence ETF
Rationale: AI specific thematic ETFs can be collateral damage in an AI valuation correction.

Name: iShares Expanded Tech Software ETF
Rationale: High multiple software franchises are exposed to demand slowdown and valuation compression in an AI bubble burst.

Name: Communication Services Select Sector SPDR Fund
Rationale: Communication platforms with diversified monetization are more resilient and can recover faster after a sell off.

Name: iShares U S Technology ETF
Rationale: Broad tech exposure still holds many frothy names that may suffer large drawdowns if AI mania unwinds.

Name: iShares Semiconductor ETF
Rationale: Reduce exposure to cyclical chip demand that can fall if AI investment sentiment retrenches.

Name: First Trust Cloud Computing ETF
Rationale: Cloud services face revenue cyclicality and potential multiple contraction in a tech repricing.

Name: iShares Bitcoin Trust spot ETF
Rationale: Spot bitcoin is exposed to rapid revaluation if the crypto bubble bursts and leverage unwinds.

Name: Fidelity Wise Origin Bitcoin ETF (spot)
Rationale: Another spot bitcoin vehicle to short as crypto routs could be severe across providers.

Name: ProShares Bitcoin Strategy ETF futures based
Rationale: Futures based bitcoin exposure magnifies downside in a crypto liquidation event due to roll and leverage.

Name: MicroStrategy Incorporated
Rationale: Corporate bitcoin vehicles can collapse when underlying crypto prices fall and margin pressure mounts.

Name: Marathon Digital Holdings
Rationale: Miners have operating leverage to bitcoin prices and face margin stress during a prolonged crypto slump.

Name: Coinbase Global
Rationale: Exchange revenues fall sharply in a crypto bear market and regulatory costs can compound losses.

Name: NVIDIA Corporation
Rationale: Nvidia has deep moats in AI compute and is likely to retain durable demand even after hype cycles.

Name: Advanced Micro Devices Incorporated
Rationale: AMD provides diversification in compute suppliers and should recover as fundamental demand normalizes.

Name: Microsoft Corporation
Rationale: Large cloud providers have diversified earnings and balance sheets that can withstand macro stress.

Name: Amazon Corporation
Rationale: Amazon has structural cash flow from commerce and cloud that can absorb cyclical shocks.
